tasks.title: Create a To-Do list
tasks.body:
You have to create a To-Do list. 
To-Do list contains the list of the tasks that the user has to do or wants to do before the deadline. After doing a task, they can mark them as completed.

Basic Features:
An input field for the date (that will be the deadline of the task added). 
Pending and completed tasks should be distinguishable.
The user can delete the task. (by clicking on the delete icon)
The top of the page shall show a quote that will change after every refresh. (You may use any API for this, for example:- Link) 

Advanced features:
Sort the task according to the deadline or date when the user added the task. 
Add image functionality in addition to the name of the task.

IMPORTANT POINTS:
You must complete the task by using ReactJS and Tailwind CSS.
The code should be well-commented and properly structured.
Itâ€™s an individual task.
Use React Hooks wherever possible and avoid using Class components.
Extra points for creativity and design.
The project/task must be on pushed on Github. Try hosting the website on Netlify as well.
Plagiarism in code would lead to consequences.
The deadline to complete the task is 2nd December 2022 11:59 PM. Strictly adhere to the deadline.
